content: JAKARTA  Jan 16 Indonesia has scrapped a land tax that companies pay while exploring for oil and gas  a move that might encourage exploration at a time of concern that it could fall sharply due to tumbling oil prices.
name: Exxon Mobil Corporation
title: REFILE-Indonesia scraps land tax on oil and gas exploration

content: NEW YORK Exxon Mobil Corp's new joint-venture oil-by-rail terminal in Canada  set to be the nation's largest  will begin shipping crude directly to its own refineries in Illinois and Louisiana by March  another reminder that pipeline delays are not stopping the rise in oil sands exports.
name: Exxon Mobil Corporation
title: Exxon's new oil-by-rail terminal in Canada gears up for U.S. shipments

content: CALGARY  Alberta  Jan 12 Exxon Mobil Corp  and its Canadian affiliate Imperial Oil Ltd  plan to spend up to C$25 billion ($21 billion) on a liquefied natural gas facility on British Columbia's northern Pacific coast  the two companies said in documents filed with the province's environmental regulator.
name: Exxon Mobil Corporation
title: Exxon says Canada LNG plans to cost up to C$25 billion

content: RIO DE JANEIRO  Jan 8 Brazil's state-run oil company said on Thursday it produced more crude oil and related liquids in the third quarter than Exxon Mobil Corp  making Petroleo Brasileiro SA the world's largest publicly traded petroleum producer for the first time.
name: Exxon Mobil Corporation
title: Petrobras petroleum output surpassed Exxon in 3rd quarter
